critique: The President's message conveys a mix of emotions. There is joy and hope due to the potential success of the Union army, but also sadness and grief for the fallen soldiers. Gratitude and reverence are also expressed towards a higher power. I will score each emotion based on its prominence in the message.Joy: The message speaks of "great success" which evokes joy.Sadness: The message mentions "many gallant fallen" which evokes sadness.Surprise: There is no element of surprise in the message.Fear: There is no element of fear in the message.Disgust: There is no element of disgust in the message.
